Class-Cleric 20 — Female Human Cleric: 20
Strength: 13 (1) Dexterity: 6 (-2) Constitution: 11 (0) Intelligence: 9 (-1) Wisdom: 18 (4) Charisma: 17 (3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Good Deity: None
Experience: 662514/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 195/390
Ability Notes:
Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Steps Of Night: Can use a bonus action to gain a 30' fly Speed in dim or no light for 1 min 6 times per long rest
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:
Divine Domain: 1 selection
Eyes Of Night: R300' Darkvision can be shared with 4 others within 10' for 1 hr once per long rest; can spend a spell slot for additional uses
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of None and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: History; Insight; Persuasion; Religion; Stealth

Combat
Hit Points: 89 Initiative: -2 Armor Class: 10 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Handaxe (+7 1d6+1 R20/60); Light Crossbow (+4 1d8-2 R80/320); Mace (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Bonus Proficiencies (Order Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Bonus Proficiencies (Twilight Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)/Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: -2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Blessed Strikes: Can inflict +1d8 radiant with a cantrip or a weapon hit once per rd
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 4
Divine Strike: Weapon inflicts +2d8 HP radiant once per rd
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Grappler: Has advantage on attacks on a grappled foe and can restrain a grappled foe with an additional successful grapple
Order's Wrath: Once per rd, can curse a Divine Strike target so that the next ally hit within 1 rd inflicts +2d8 psychic
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (save DC 18 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Vigilant Blessing: Touched gains advantage on the next initiative
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 9; Constitution: 0; Dexterity: -2; Intelligence: -1; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 10
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 3; C6: 2; C7: 2; C8: 1; C9: 1; D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: C: 10; D: 10 Spell DC: C: 18; D: 18
Spells:
Aid (C2 [Peace Domain] Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Antimagic Field (C8 Abju): 10' radius suppresses magic for concentration up to 1 hr
Aura Of Life (C4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction, and raises those with 0 hit points to 1 hit point, for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Life (C4 [Twilight Domain] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction, and raises those with 0 hit points to 1 hit point, for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Purity (C4 [Peace Domain] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (C3 [Twilight Domain] Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Beacon Of Hope (C3 [Peace Domain] Abju): R30' Targets gain advantage on Wisdom and death saves and regain maximum hit points from healing for concentration up to 1 min
Bestow Curse (C3 Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Calm Emotions (C2 Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses a choice of charm and fright or hostility (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Circle Of Power (C5 [Twilight Domain] Abju): Allies in a 30' radius have advantage on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for concentration up to 10 min
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Command (C1 [Order Domain] Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Commune (C5 Divi): Deity answers 3 yes/no questions; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Commune (C5 [Order Domain] Divi): Deity answers 3 yes/no questions; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Compulsion (C4 [Order Domain] Ench): R30' Self controls target movement direction (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Control Water (C4 Tran): R300' Water in a 100' cube rises 20', parts, redirects, or forms a whirlpool for concentration up to 10 min
Cure Wounds (D1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+4 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Detect Evil And Good (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dominate Person (C5 [Order Domain] Ench): R60' Target humanoid obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 6, 7, or 8]
Etherealness (C7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr [+Level affects +2 or +5 targets at level 8 or 9]
Faerie Fire (C1 [Twilight Domain] Evoc): R60' Objects in a 20' cube glow, giving foes advantage on attacks (save Dexterity negates), for concentration up to 1 min
Forbiddance (C6 Abju): Touched 40000 sq ft bars teleport and portals; entry inflicts 5d10 HP of a choice of radiant or necrotic to one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 day; casting daily for 30 days makes the effects permanent [R]
Freedom Of Movement (C4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Gate (C9 Conj): R60' Opens a circular portal to another plane for concentration up to 1 min; can be used to bring a creature from another plane
Gentle Repose (C2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 days [R]
Greater Invisibility (C4 [Twilight Domain] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Greater Restoration (C5 [Peace Domain] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Guiding Bolt (C1 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Heal (C6 Evoc): R60' Target regains 70 hit points and recovers from blinded, deafened, and diseased [+Level restores +10 hit points]
Heroism (C1 [Order Domain] Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +4 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Heroism (C1 [Peace Domain] Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +4 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Person (C2 [Order Domain] Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Leomund's Tiny Hut (C3 [Twilight Domain] Evoc): Creates a 10' radius dome, impassable by objects and spells, for 8 hr [R]
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Locate Creature (C4 [Order Domain] Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Locate Object (C2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Mass Healing Word (C3 [Order Domain] Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 1d4+4 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Mislead (C5 [Twilight Domain] Illu): Makes self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate that can move 60' and share senses for concentration up to 1 hr; attacking or casting ends
Moonbeam (C2 [Twilight Domain] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (save Constitution half; shapechangers have disadvantage and revert form on failure) and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Otiluke's Resilient Sphere (C4 [Peace Domain] Evoc): R30' Traps the target in an impervious sphere (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 4d8 HP and ends the spell
Purify Food And Drink (C1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Raise Dead (C5 Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Rary's Telepathic Bond (C5 [Peace Domain] Divi): R30' 8 willing targets can communicate mentally for 1 hr [R]
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Resistance (D0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save within concentration up to 1 min
Sanctuary (C1 [Peace Domain] Abju): R30' Foes of the target cannot attack it (save Wisdom negates) for 1 min; target attacking ends
See Invisibility (C2 [Twilight Domain] Divi): Reveals invisible and ethereal creatures and objects for 1 hr
Sending (C3 [Peace Domain] Evoc): Self can exchange 25-word messages with a familiar target
Sleep (C1 [Twilight Domain] Ench): R90' 20' radius puts to sleep 5d8 hit points of creatures, starting with those with the least hit points, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 hit points of creatures]
Slow (C3 [Order Domain] Tran): R120' 6 targets in a 40' cube suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, loss of reactions, and no more than 1 action per rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched dying creature becomes stable
Summon Celestial (C5 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient celestial spirit (40 hit points; move 30' and fly 40'; multiattack equal to half the spell level; touch restores 2d8+5 hit points once per day) of type avenger (armor class 16; R150' inflicts 2d6+7 HP radiant) or defender (armor class 18; inflicts 1d10+8 HP radiant and gives 1d10 temporary hit points to a creature within 10') for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the armor class by 1, hit points by 10, attack damage by 1, and healing by 1]
Symbol (C7 Abju): Inscribes a touch object with a permanent glyph that, when triggered, inflicts a choice of harmful magic effect—10d10 HP necrotic (save Constitution half), arguing for 1 min (save Constitution negates), frightened and fleeing for 1 min (save Wisdom negates), overwhelmed with despair for 1 min (save Charisma negates), insane for 1 min (save Intelligence negates), incapacitated by pain for 1 min (save Constitution negates), asleep for 10 min or until shaken or harmed (save Wisdom negates), or stunned for 1 min (save Wisdom negates)
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Warding Bond (C2 [Peace Domain] Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and any damage to the target also affects self, for 1 hr
Water Walk (C3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can traverse liquids for 1 hr [R]
Zone Of Truth (C2 [Order Domain] Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma negates) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips and can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Balm Of Peace: Can use Channel Divinity to move 30' without provoking opportunity attacks, restoring 2d6+4 hit points to each target within 5'
Cantrip Versatility: Can replace a cantrip when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 3 times per short rest
Divine Intervention: Has a 100% chance to gain help from None once per week
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells that inflict lightning damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Embodiment Of The Law: Can cast a 1-action enchantment spell as a bonus action 4 times per long rest
Emboldening Bond: R30' Can give 6 willing targets +1d4 on an attack, ability check, or save once per rd for 10 min when within 30' of another 6 times per long rest
Expansive Bond: The range of Emboldening Bond and Protective Bond increases to 60', and Protective Bond gives resistance to the damage taken
Harness Divine Power: Can use Channel Divinity and a bonus action to regain a spell slot up to level 3 3 times per long rest
Order's Demand: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to charm targets (save DC 18 Wisdom negates; damage ends) for 1 rd
Potent Spellcasting: +4 HP Cleric cantrip damage
Protective Bond: An Emboldening Bond member can use a reaction to teleport 30' and take another's damage
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Twilight Sanctuary: Can use Channel Divinity to create a 30' radius for 1 min that gives targets a choice of 1d6+20 temporary hit points or an end to a charmed or frightened condition
Twilight Shroud: Twilight Sanctuary gives half cover
Voice Of Authority: Allied target of a self spell can use a reaction to make an attack
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
